name: Operation Chromite 1950 VR
description: Please enter ‘Incheon landing operation’ as crucial reason of victory in Korean war on 1950. You experience all from the landing operation to the end as an unit of landing troops.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or better port also required
